english.segment1: Ain't no sunshine when she's gone. It's not warm when she's away. Ain't no sunshine when she's gone. She's gone much too long. Any time she goes away
english.segment2: Ain't no sunshine when she's gone. Wonder if she's gone to stay. Ain't no sunshine when she's gone. And this house just ain't no home. Anytime she goes away
english.segment3: I know. She's gone to stay. It's breakin' me up. Anytime she goes away. Gotta leave the young thing alone. There ain't no sunshine when she's gone
